text: Ane jyare ibrahima (a.Sa.) E kahyum ke he mara palanahara! Mane batava tum mrtakone kevi rite jivita karisa? (Allaha ta'ala'e) kahyum sum tane imana nathi? Javaba apyo imana to che parantu maru hrdaya santusta tha'i jaya, pharamavyum cara pankhi'o la'i lo, te'ona tukada kari nakho, pachi dareka parvata para teno eka eka tukado muki do, pachi tene pokaro, tamari pase dodine avi jase ane jani lo ke allaha ta'ala vijayi, hikamatovalo che
